titleStmt.title: A catalogue of sundrie knights, aldermen, doctors ministers and citizens, who denying to contribute money for the publicke safety, and other misdemeanors, are in custody in Gresham Colledge, Crosby house, and other places in and about the cities of London and Westminster, by authority from the Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Iackson, G. Green, and P. Smith, and are to be sold in the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
